participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly, but often puts work before personal projects.
participant_1.background: I believe that I have a good relationship with my family. I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies. I have freckles all over my face. During the week, I work as a barista. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and youthful, enjoys music and has a strong sense of personal style.
participant_2.background: My clothes make me feel like a young woman, even though I am in my forties. I hate skiing. I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands. I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders. I am vegan.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Good! I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.
That sounds exciting! What bands are you going to see?
I am going to see The Killers, The Lumineers, and Imagine Dragons.
Oh wow, that is a great lineup! I love all of those bands.
Me too! I am really excited to see them live.
What do you do for work?
Oh wow! That is so cool! I have always wanted to try vegan food.
I might just have to take you up on that offer.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, go to the movies, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do those things too.
Great! I will send you my number
